TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationManager extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationManager Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class ApplicationManager sealed : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 裝載應用程式的 ASP.NET 應用程式定義域。

span.span: Manages ASP.NET application domains for an ASP.NET hosting application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件所提供的主控環境中的 ASP.NET 應用程式物件的存留期管理。The object provides lifetime management of objects in the hosting environment for an ASP.NET application. 它會負責：It is responsible for: - 啟用及初始化 ASP.NET 應用程式。Activating and initializing ASP.NET applications. - 管理應用程式存留期和物件的存留期的應用程式中註冊。Managing the application lifetime and the lifetime of objects registered in the application. - 公開用來處理 ASP.NET 應用程式要求裝載環境的物件。Exposing objects used by the hosting environment to process ASP.NET application requests. - 提供在任何給定時刻裝載處理序中執行應用程式的清單。Providing a list of applications running in the hosting process at any given moment.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Close ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed
Public Sub Close ()
public: void Close();

summary.span: 關閉全部應用程式定義域。

span.span: Shuts down all application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫方法可減少使用的應用程式管理員，為 0 時，應用程式的參考計數方法呼叫方法。If a call to the method reduces the reference count of applications using the application manager to 0, the method calls the method.

summary.span: 建立指定之應用程式定義域的物件和物件型別。

span.span: Creates an object for the specified application domain and object type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject CreateObject (string appId, Type type, string virtualPath, string physicalPath, bool failIfExists);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Hosting.IRegisteredObject CreateObject(string appId, class System.Type type, string virtualPath, string physicalPath, bool failIfExists) cil managed
public: System::Web::Hosting::IRegisteredObject ^ CreateObject(System::String ^ appId, Type ^ type, System::String ^ virtualPath, System::String ^ physicalPath, bool failIfExists);

param.name: appId
param.span: 應用程式的唯一識別項，該應用程式擁有物件。

span.span: The unique identifier for the application that owns the object.

param.name: type
param.span: 要建立的物件類型。

span.span: The type of the object to create.

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 應用程式的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to the application.

param.name: physicalPath
param.span: 應用程式的實體路徑。

span.span: The physical path to the application.

param.name: failIfExists
param.span: 表示如果指定型別的物件目前已註冊則擲回例外狀況， 表示傳回指定型別的現有註冊物件。

span.span: to throw an exception if an object of the specified type is currently registered; to return the existing registered object of the specified type.

summary.span: 根據型別、虛擬路徑和實體路徑建立指定應用程式定義域的物件，如果指定型別的物件已存在，則會使用布林值 (Boolean) 表示失敗行為。

span.span: Creates an object for the specified application domain based on type, virtual and physical paths, and a Boolean value indicating failure behavior when an object of the specified type already exists.
A new object of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來建立並註冊應用程式中的物件。The method is used to create and register objects in the application. 可以建立每個類型只能有一個物件。Only one object of each type can be created. 如果您需要建立多個相同類型的物件，您必須實作的物件 factory。If you need to create multiple objects of the same type, you must implement an object factory. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題的程式碼範例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. 唯一的應用程式識別項所識別的每個應用程式，會執行它自己的應用程式定義域中。Each application, identified by a unique application identifier, runs in its own application domain. 方法中指定的應用程式的應用程式定義域中建立指定型別的物件`appID`參數。The method creates an object of the specified type in the application domain of the application specified in the `appID` parameter. 如果應用程式定義域不存在指定的應用程式，會建立一個物件建立之前。If an application domain does not exist for the specified application, one is created before the object is created. `failIfExists`參數控制行為的方法時指定之類型的物件已經存在於應用程式。The `failIfExists` parameter controls the behavior of the method when an object of the specified type already exists in the application. 當`failIfExists`是`true`、方法會擲回例外狀況。When `failIfExists` is `true`, the method throws an exception. 當`failIfExists`是`false`、方法會傳回指定之型別的現有已註冊的物件。When `failIfExists` is `false`, the method returns the existing registered object of the specified type. 方法呼叫的多載會採用額外`throwOnError`參數`throwOnError`設`false`。The method calls the overload that takes an additional `throwOnError` parameter with `throwOnError` set to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是已登錄的物件的物件 factory 設計模式實作。The following code example is an implementation of the object-factory design pattern for registered objects. 使用處理站模式，可讓您註冊多個物件執行個體。Using the factory pattern enables you to register multiple instances of an object. 此範例包含兩個物件： `SampleComponent`，它是應用程式的物件會使用多個執行個體，和`SampleComponentFactory`，它負責管理一份`SampleComponent`執行個體。The example contains two objects: `SampleComponent`, which is the object the application will use multiple instances of, and `SampleComponentFactory`, which manages a list of `SampleComponent` instances. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/CS/appManagercs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationManager/VB/appManagervb.aspx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 根據型別、虛擬路徑和實體路徑建立指定之應用程式定義域的物件，如果指定型別的物件已存在，則會使用布林值表示失敗行為，且布林值會指出是否擲回裝載初始設定錯誤例外狀況。

span.span: Creates an object for the specified application domain based on type, virtual and physical paths, a Boolean value indicating failure behavior when an object of the specified type already exists, and a Boolean value indicating whether hosting initialization error exceptions are thrown.
A new object of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法提供`throwOnError`參數，可讓您控制是否裝載初始化例外狀況擲回。This overload of the method provides the `throwOnError` parameter, which allows you to control whether hosting initialization exceptions are thrown. 多載方法並未提供`throwOnError`呼叫參數設定為使用這個多載`false`。The overload of the method that does not provide `throwOnError` calls this overload with the parameter set to `false`.

summary.span: 傳回與這個 ASP.NET 主機處理序關聯之 物件的單一執行個體。

span.span: Returns the single instance of the object associated with this ASP.NET host process.

returns.span: 與正在執行的 ASP.NET 主機處理序關聯之 物件的單一執行個體。

span.span: The single instance of the object associated with the ASP.NET host process that is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一個執行個體由 ASP.NET 主機處理序預設應用程式定義域中建立物件。Only one instance of the object is created by an ASP.NET host process in the default application domain. 如果執行個體類別沒有方法會先建立的執行個體類別，然後傳回新建立的物件。If an instance of the class is not available, the method first creates an instance of the class and then returns the newly created object. 如果執行個體先前建立類別，方法會傳回現有的物件。If an instance of the class was previously created, the method returns the existing object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來擷取Web 應用程式的執行個體。The following code example uses the method to retrieve the instance for a Web application. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo/CS/applicationInfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo/VB/applicationInfovb.aspx#1)]

[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo/CS/applicationInfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationInfo/VB/applicationInfovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override object InitializeLifetimeService ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object InitializeLifetimeService() cil managed
Public Overrides Function InitializeLifetimeService () As Object
public: override System::Object ^ InitializeLifetimeService();

summary.span: 藉由防止建立使用期 (Lease)，為應用程式定義域提供無限的存留期 (Lifetime)。

span.span: Gives the application domain an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫其基底類別中的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它會一律傳回`null`，因而會防止建立會限制應用程式定義域的存留期的使用期。It always returns `null` and thereby prevents a lease from being created that would limit the application domain's lifetime.

.method public hidebysig instance bool IsIdle() cil managed
Public Function IsIdle () As Boolean
public: bool IsIdle();

summary.span: 傳回值，指出處理序所裝載 (Host) 的全部應用程式是否都在閒置 (Idle) 而未在處理要求。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether all applications hosted by the process are idle and not processing requests.

returns.span: 如果處理序中的全部應用程式都在閒置則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if all applications in the process are idle; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`true`如果處理序所裝載的所有應用程式會處於閒置狀態。The method returns `true` if all applications hosted by the process are idle.

summary.span: 將應用程式管理員執行個體的使用者參考次數 (Reference Count) 進行安全執行緒遞增。

span.span: Makes a thread-safe increment to the user reference count of the application manager instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ShutdownAll ();
.method public hidebysig instance void ShutdownAll() cil managed
Public Sub ShutdownAll ()
public: void ShutdownAll();

summary.span: 卸載全部應用程式資源。

span.span: Unloads all application resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法相當於呼叫方法在此管理的所有應用程式定義域執行個體; 不過，方法可以從受管理的應用程式定義域之外呼叫。Calling the method is equivalent to calling the method in all application domains managed by this instance; however, the method can be called from outside the managed application domains.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ShutdownApplication (string appId);
.method public hidebysig instance void ShutdownApplication(string appId) cil managed
Public Sub ShutdownApplication (appId As String)
public: void ShutdownApplication(System::String ^ appId);

param.name: appId
param.span: 要卸載之應用程式的唯一識別項。

span.span: The unique identifier of the application to unload.
Unloads the specified application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法相當於呼叫方法特定的應用程式定義域中; 不過，方法可以從外部的受管理應用程式定義域呼叫。Calling the method is equivalent to calling the method for a specific application domain; however, the method can be called from outside managed application domains.

summary.span: 從應用程式的註冊物件清單中移除指定的物件。

summary.span: 如果要移除的物件是應用程式之已註冊物件清單中的最後一個剩餘物件，則會卸載該應用程式。

span.span: If the object to be removed is the last remaining object in the list of registered objects in an application, the application is unloaded.
